intent: Create a deployment for nginx with 3 replicas
generated_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx

intent: Deploy nodejs app with health checks on port 3000
generated_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Application
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: nodejs
    app.kubernetes.io/name: nodejs
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: nodejs
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v3.7.3
    helm.sh/chart: nodejs-server-2.7.3
    helm.sh/chart: nodejs-server-2.7.3.3
  name: nodejs
  namespace: default

    port: 3000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 3000
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: nodejs

intent: Deploy app with ConfigMap for configuration
generated_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Application
metadata:
  name: app
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: app
        app.kubernetes.io/name: app
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: app
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.18.0
    helm.sh/chart: v2.18.0
    spec:
      app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.18.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --deploy-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/app
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/config.yaml
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath

intent: Deploy secure postgres with non-root user, resource limits, and health checks

      labels:

    spec:

intent: Create CronJob to backup database every night
generated_yaml:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: backup-database
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TARGET
          value: v1alpha1
        image: docker.io/{username}/backup-database
